titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the assizes held at Dorchestor in the county of Dorset, upon the fourth day of March in the year of our Lord 1669 by John Straight ...
titleStmt.author: Straight, John, 1605?-1680.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the assizes held at Dorchestor in the county of Dorset, upon the fourth day of March in the year of our Lord 1669 by John Straight ...
titleStmt.author: Straight, John, 1605?-1680.

notesStmt.note: "Containing the metaphorical description of a sincere Christian: 1, by his care and providence, 2, by his pains and industry, 3, by his wisdome and discretion, 4, by the ensuing perils and dangers, 5, by the invalidity of all perills and dangers, 6, by the cause and reason of this firm validity."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
